Reviews.Title: Canon 70D kit
Reviews.Author: Hector Cisneros
Reviews.Content: Because even though the camera is awsome, the accesories are not that good. Specially the tripod which broke easily on the first day

Reviews.Title: Not worth what I paid for it!
Reviews.Author: Larry Douglas Smith
Reviews.Content: The auto-focus is very noisy when operating in the video mode and can be heard above the other sounds of the recording when being played on computer as a movie!The Wi-Fi is very slow, hard to set up and dose not work in video mode.This D70 takes a good picture  when set in auto mode but the digital zoom is a complete waste and don’t take the picture zoomed on.I wouldn’t buy it again and wish I had my money back. For general picture & video taking my Samsung Note 2 is easer to use and takes just as good picture as the D70.

Canon EOS 70D 20.2 MP Digital SLR Camera with Dual Pixel CMOS AF and EF-S 18-135mm F3.5-5.6 IS with Canon EF 70-300mm f/4-5.6 IS USM Lens
Includes: Canon EF 70-300mm f/4-5.6 IS USM Lens, Transcend 32 GB SDHC Class 10 Flash Memory Card, Ultra High Quality Battery Pack for Canon EOS,
Opteka RC-4 Wireless Remote Control for Canon, Opteka OPT540 54" Compact Professional Photo / Video Tripod,
Opteka High Definition II UV (0) Ultra Violet Haze Multi-Coated Glass Filter, Opteka High Definition² Professional 5 Piece Filter Kit (UV, CPL, FL, ND4 and 10x Macro Lens), HDMI Cable,
Opteka Microfiber Deluxe Photo/Video Camera Gadget Bag for Digital Cameras & Camcorders, Opteka Digital Camera / Camcorder Lens Cleaning Kit, Tabletop Tripod, & LCD Screen Protectors, Jumpstart Guide to Digital SLR Photography in Snap DVD, 47 Street Photo Cleaning Cloth
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS 70D 20.2 MP Digital SLR Camera with Dual Pixel CMOS AF and EF-S 18-135mm F3.5-5.6 IS STM Super Kit with Canon EF 70-300mm f/4-5.6 IS USM Lens, 32GB Memory Card, Spare Battery, Filters + More.
